subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nikolai Zherdev, who missed all of the preseason and his team’s first two games, scored two goals for the Blue Jackets Monday, who beat the Coyotes 5-1.
snippet: Nikolai Zherdev, who missed all of the preseason and his team’s first two games, scored two goals for the Blue Jackets Monday, who beat the Coyotes 5-1.
